import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { register } from './UserFunction' import './auth.css' import { useToasts } from 'react-toast-notifications' const { addToast } = useToasts() class Register extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '', } this.onChange = this.onChange.bind(this) } onChange(e) { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } handleFormSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); // handle actual form submission here const newUser = { firstName: this.state.firstName, lastName: this.state.lastName, email: this.state.email, password: this.state.password, confirmPassword: this.state.confirmPassword } register(newUser).then(res => { console.log(res) addToast('12312312', { appearance: 'success', autoDismiss: true, }) // this.props.history.push(`/login`) }) } render() { return (

Sign Up to Lightspeed Retail (X-Series)

Already have account?
) } } export default Register
